dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3714 IH: Harriet Tubman Tribute Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Katko (for himself and Mr. Cummings) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to redesign $20 Federal reserve notes so as to include a likeness of Harriet Tubman, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Harriet Tubman Tribute Act of 2017.

section.header: Likeness of Harriet Tubman required to be included on the face of $20 Federal reserve notes
section.text: The 8th undesignated paragraph of section 16 of the Federal Reserve Act (12 U.S.C. 418) is amended by adding at the end the following new sentence: The Secretary of the Treasury shall ensure that the face of all $20 Federal reserve notes printed after December 31, 2019, shall bear the likeness of Harriet Tubman..
